title: Reignover 8/1/8 and cannot win means...
body:
Professional Olaf's reign is at an end. We probably won't be seeing him anymore. Very frown.

Also, Seasons 1 through 6; Things are balanced, build more assassin power with any lead,

Season 7; Everyone's a tank. Build more damage just to succeed or lose.

Make everyone a tank and people have to build damage only more than ever before, rofl!

replies.body:
Or Team liquid, as a team, in whole isn't as skilled as TSM.

Which has been proven time and time again.

I have noticed olaf's drop off  in all region games I watch.  I'm guessing a cleaver titanic build into tank must suck on him?  



> [{quoted}](name=That Juicy Booty,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=EFUpmZJE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-17T20:05:45.723+0000)
>
> Or Team liquid, as a team, in whole isn't as skilled as TSM.
> 
> Which has been proven time and time again.

Of course, but reignover did stop being threatening.

You do stop becoming threatening, when you're a tank and you're adc walk into ori ball free of charge near baron to get one shot, olaf cant stop that... and you cant say goldenglue does good.


Olaf is decent, but he needs setup... TL doesn't give good setup, they cant even settle on a starting lineup.
Fun Game for RO, but I bet piglet complained that he Kill Stealed and blamed the loss on RO killstealing.

Has nothing to really do about Reignover on Olaf or any champion and still losing.  Team Liquid seems to get 2-3 early kills from either Reignover in the fights to get assists or kills for himself and they're still losing. At the end of the day it's TL not Olaf that's the problem.  
 How do you lose with a 8-1-8 score ?  - With a garbage team and not knowing what to do from the Captain himself Reignover.

Olaf isn't the problem, the problem is sorta twofold: a) the only way they're going to make olaf work in competitive is if they build him bruiserey (things like bork, steraks, and a few tank items) and b) TL as a whole can't make meta picks look decent, let alone fringey ones.
